overview_of_class: The primary object of this course will be to use economic laboratory experiments - essentially interactive classroom activities from your perspective - to (1) help you solidify your understanding of economic principles, (2) give you insight into how, why, and when some models perform well while others struggle to predict outcomes, and (3) allow you to evaluate the legitimacy and applicability of conclusions based on economic experiments.
name: Experimental Economics
subject: ECON
